data.message: Hi Facebook admins. I wanted you to know that i uninstalled and deleted both Facebook and the messenger apps from my phone. I won't use them again until the privacy issue is resolved. Thank you.

replies.message: Hello Miranda. We hear your concern—many of the reports about Messenger app permissions simply aren't true. Learn more about how we actually use permissions for Messenger: http://on.fb.me/1wOXcZv -Sarah

Thank you Facebook admins for your response. I do like using FB to keep up with my family and friends. But I see that link says that Facebook "doesn't" do so n so n so n so... I am not interested in doesn't. I want "Can't" I hate to be so pushy about it but I'm just letting yall know what I need to be able to once again use your apps. Please allow users to opt out? Thank you once again for your attention to my concerns :)

I hope you can understand my point. I do many things in privacy but with my phone in the room. I won't go into the list but it gets pretty intimate... I don't want any app to have access to my camera or microphone. There has to be a way to protect users. And I am not just addressing my concerns with FB either. There are other apps with similar terms of service agreement that I am also taking this issue up with. It's a -How will you know I have a concern if I don't say so?- kind of thing
Facebook is lieing to our faces
